hero_title: Modern payment solutions for the world
hero_description: Accept payments in any currency to cards and accounts worldwide. Fast, secure, no hidden fees. Solutions for businesses and freelancers.
block_1_text_1: Accept Visa, MasterCard and all major international cards. Instant crediting in your chosen currency to your account or card. Transparent rates, no hidden fees.
block_1_text_2: Our team of experts is always available to help with integration and payment questions.
block_1_text_3: Integrate once — get access to all payment tools. Scale your business without limits.
block_1_text_4: Your funds and data are protected by encryption, 3D Secure, and 2FA. Full compliance with international standards.
block_2_title_1: P2P Transfers to Cards and Accounts
block_2_text_1: Instant receipt in any supported currency from banks worldwide. Your clients pay to card or account, and you get notifications and transparent reporting.
block_2_text_2: Accept online payments for your store or platform. Support for subscriptions, refunds, and chargeback management.
block_3_description: Growth solutions — from startups to large companies.
block_3_text_3: Pay only for completed client payments.
block_3_text_4: Personal support and 24/7 assistance always available.
block_4_text_1: The client initiates a payment and transfers funds to your account or card. The system instantly records the receipt of funds.
block_4_text_2: After the funds are received, we perform verification, comply with all requirements, and prepare the payout. Everything is automated.
block_4_text_3: Net funds are credited to your account. You receive notifications and can track all transactions in real time.
block_4_text_4: Our technical support monitors all transactions 24/7 for your security.
block_5_description: Leave a request or write to us on Telegram — we will respond within 5 minutes.
block_5_description_2: Contact us in Telegram and get a quick answer from our team. What payment solution are you interested in?
